name: Chronikles of Ugpin: The Artic Savoir
name_original: Chronikles of Ugpin: The Artic Savoir
description:
THIS IS A PARODY GAME MADE FOR A GAME JAM AND WILL NOT BE SOLD NOR MONITIZED.

Witness the origins of the legendary Ugpin and his rise to power and godhood.

Face the legion of evil time ducks as you travel across this realm to confront the lord of time himself - AND TAKE HIS PLACE.

Use all the tools at your disposal and seize your rightful place among the gods.

Controls:

AD - Move

Space - Jump/ Fly

Right click - Pause

Left Click - Fire

ALT F4/ ALT CTRL DELETE - To Quit/ Exit
